TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit UdfClassAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class UdfClassAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class UdfClassAttribute sealed : Attribute

Docs.summary: Marks a class as a user-defined function class.

remarks.para: To use custom functions in a class as Excel Services user-defined functions, you should mark your user-defined function class with this attribute. Any classes that are not marked with this attribute in the user-defined function assembly are ignored by Excel Calculation Services. They are not considered Excel Services user-defined function classes.
